snippet: SHAIO--Anne Dubonnet, 85, widow of the late Victor Shaio, died peacefully at her home in New York City on February 27 after a long illness. She is survived by her son, Alain Foussier and his wife Janka, of Woudsend, the Netherlands; her daughter, Elizabeth Uzielli and her husband Dennis O'Donnell, of New York; and her grandson, Alexander O'Donnell. Visitation will be held at Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel," 81st St. and Madison Ave., Monday, 4pm-7pm. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Chapin School, New York, NY; or to St. Timothy's School, Stevenson, MD. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHAIO--Anne Dubonnet, 85, widow of the late Victor Shaio, died peacefully at her home in New York City on February 27 after a long illness. She is survived by her son, Alain Foussier and his wife Janka, of Woudsend, the Netherlands; her daughter, Elizabeth Uzielli and her husband Dennis O'Donnell, of New York; and her grandson, Alexander O'Donnell. Visitation will be held at Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel," 81st St. and Madison Ave., Monday, 4pm-7pm. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Chapin School, New York, NY; or to St. Timothy's School, Stevenson, MD. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHAIO, ANNE DUBONNET
